# `BuActivitySettingsRequest` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| defaultActivityCodeId | `string` | No | The ID of the activity code. This is the activity code that will be used by default for agent development activities added to the schedule |
